title: Getting Started
description: Master core movement so you can explore the arena.

steps.text: Welcome to the arena! Let's get you moving.
objectives: Press the Start button to continue.

default: Tap Start when you're ready to begin.

hints: Close the settings panel to reveal the Start button.
The Start button is glowing in the lower-right corner—select it to proceed.

steps.text: Move toward the checkpoint to learn the controls.
objectives: Use WASD or the arrow keys to walk.

default: Hold W or the up arrow to advance toward the checkpoint beacon.

hints: Try tapping any movement key to leave the spawn pad.
Steer toward the blue light—the checkpoint marks your destination.
Strafe with A or D to slide along the wall and clear the corner.

steps.text: Jump the barrier to finish the warm-up.
objectives: Press Space to jump over the barrier.

default: Tap Space while moving forward to clear the barrier.

hints: Begin walking toward the barrier before you attempt the jump.
Jump a split-second earlier so you take off before colliding with the barrier.

completion.summary: You can now roam the arena freely.
